author: carlosrovira
msg: Added Carlos Rovira to the Apache Flex Team as commiter

author: chenpei
msg: CTAKES-12 - Upgrade Lucene indexes to 4.0.0 [dictionary-lookup:rxnorm_index,drug_index,snomed-like_codes_sample, snomed-like_sample
From 3.0.2 > 3.2.0 > 3.5.0 > 4.0.0.  Updated pom.xml's to use the new modular lucene from m2.
Manually tested using the DefaultAggregateUMLS and DefaultAggregatePlainText Pipeline with the dummy sample notes.
Deleted the various .zip versions of the indexes since they are already unpacked.
[Recommend that we should only release 3.1 after the regression test suite is in place]
CTAKES-63 - Added escape() call when querying.  When tokens have special chars such as ][, it needs to be escaped.
